DOC.brief_title: Contrast-medium Induced Nephrotoxicity Patients Undergoing Coronary Angiography - Iodixanol Versus Iopromide
DOC.detailed_description: Iodixanol , nonionic , dimeric , iso-osmolar contrast medium ( IOCM ) , may less nephrotoxic nonionic , monomeric , low-osmolar contrast medium ( LOCMs ) high-risk patient . We compare nephrotoxicity iodixanol iopromide , nonionic , monomeric LOCM , patient renal impairment .
